scripts.check:duplicates: node -e "let s=require('fs').readFileSync('package.json','utf8'); let keys=[]; JSON.parse(s,(k,v)=>{if(k){if(keys.includes(k)){throw new Error('Duplicate key: '+k)}; keys.push(k)} return v}); console.log('No duplicate keys found!')"
scripts.install:all: npm --prefix client install && npm --prefix server install
scripts.build: npm --prefix client run build && npm --prefix server run build
